title: Custom Game
body: Would you get banned if you left a custom game with only you and bots?

replies.body:
Nope! If you leave a game with only bots there will be no punishments at all.

I think even if there are real people on the enemy team you wont get banned, unless they report you. Don't take that as gospel though, I've just noticed it through experience.
But when I press leave in a custom game with only bots it says I might be banned in future games.
That's just because normals and customs use the same layout. Riot's too lazy to make a special one for customs :D
